product_overview: TripWise is a comprehensive mobile travel planning application that leverages AI technology to offer smart itinerary creation, expense management, and collaborative planning. It integrates advanced features such as Firebase authentication, real-time cost tracking, multi-language translation, and AI-powered travel advisory for an enhanced user experience.
core_goals: Enable users to create detailed, AI-assisted travel itineraries tailored to their preferences.
Provide robust management of travel activities, expenses, and budget synchronization in real-time.
Offer intelligent travel tools including multi-language translation, weather forecasts, currency conversion, and world clock functionalities.
Facilitate collaborative trip planning and real-time sharing among users and friends.
Integrate an AI Travel Agent to suggest locations, accommodations, cost estimates, and automate itinerary generation.
Deliver smart notifications for activity reminders, budget alerts, and significant weather updates.
Ensure secure user authentication and profile management with Firebase integration.
key_features: Smart Trip Planning: AI-powered itinerary creation with detailed scheduling and activity management.
Collaborative Planning: Allow users to share and collaborate on trip planning with friends.
Expense Tracking and Reporting: Real-time expense tracking with categorized reports and group cost sharing.
Map Integration: Incorporate Google Maps for location viewing and navigation.
Smart Travel Tools: Multi-language text and image translation, detailed weather forecasts, currency exchange, and world clocks.
AI Travel Agent: Intelligent recommendations for destinations, hotels, activities, and cost estimation using LangChain and LangGraph.
Smart Notifications: Alerts for upcoming activities, budget overruns, weather warnings, and collaborative updates.
Secure Authentication: Firebase-based login via Google and email/password, profile updates, and travel statistics.
System Architecture: Comprises Flutter mobile app, FastAPI backend with RESTful APIs, AI Travel Agent service, and Firebase cloud services.
user_flow_summary: User logs in securely via Firebase using Google Sign-in or email/password.
User creates or edits a travel plan using AI-assisted itinerary generation and manual activity management.
User adds expenses with real-time updates and categorizations, syncing budgets accordingly.
User engages with AI Travel Agent for recommendations on locations, hotels, activities, and cost estimates.
User collaborates by inviting friends to plans and sharing updates in real-time.
User receives smart notifications about schedule reminders, budget alerts, and weather updates.
User manages profile information and views historical travel statistics within the app.
validation_criteria: User authentication and authorization workflows function securely and reliably with Firebase integration.
AI itinerary generation produces relevant, personalized travel plans according to user preferences.
Expense tracking updates in real-time with accurate categorization and budget synchronization.
Collaborative planning features allow seamless sharing and updating among multiple users without data loss or conflicts.
Smart notifications are delivered timely and correctly based on user schedules, budgets, and weather conditions.
Map displays and navigation function accurately within the app context.
Backend RESTful API endpoints respond correctly, maintaining performance and reliability under expected load.
Mobile app UI/UX is consistent, intuitive, and responsive across supported devices and platforms.
All third-party integrations (Firebase, LangChain, Google Maps) function correctly with appropriate error handling and security safeguards.
